alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 27 at 9:08PM PST until December 28 at 3:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST TUESDAY ABOVE 5500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow occurring. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Expect damage to trees and power lines as well. Additional wet snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches are expected. * WHERE...San Diego County Mountains. * WHEN...Until 3 AM Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for significant reductions in visibility at times. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning for wet snow means severe winter weather conditions are occurring. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
